help.description: Returns a list of commands, you are able to use or informations about a specific command!

error.unknown: This command is unknown. Use `$0help` for a list of commands.

signup.description: Posts a Signup message into a specific channel

error.missing_arguments: There are arguments missing, see `$0help signup` for more information
error.voiceDescription: The channel needs to be a Text channel!

signup.already_signed_up_desc: You already signed up for this War.

confirmation.title: Player found
confirmation.desc:
We have found the following Informations about your Character.
Please confirm these Informations and we will sign you up for the upcoming war.
confirmation.name: Ingame Name

success.title: Successfully signed up
success.desc: We successfully signed you up for the upcoming war!

signup.edit_description: Please react with the given emoji to select which information you want to edit

edit.gearscore_desc: Please enter your current Gear Score

signout.confirmation_desc: We have successfully signed you out from the upcoming War!
signout.error_desc: There was an error while signing you out.

error.unknown: This command is unknown. Use `$0help` for a list of commands.
error.generic_error: There was an Error executing the command `$0$1`.
error.general_format:
Your command is not well formated:
`$0<Command> [args] [--<option> [option-arg]]`
error.args_format:
Your arguments are not well formated.
*Hint: Arguments with spaces must be surrounded by one " and cannot contain any additional "*
error.params_format:
Your options are not well formated.
*Hint: Options must start with '--' and __can__ contain one additional argument.*

labels.usage: React with the shown number to execute that command!
